message: I propose we split the $1,000,000 evenly. This ensures fairness and mutual benefit.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I think I deserve more for my negotiating skills.
I suggest we adjust the division to reflect the diminishing value of money with inflation. My proposal aims for a fair compromise considering the economic context.
I'm willing to compromise further, but I think I deserve a larger share to account for my reduced purchasing power due to inflation.
